description: Returns member information for the specified group. This operation supports pagination with the use of the NextToken request and response parameters. If more results are available, the ListGroupMembers.NextToken member contains a token that you pass in the next call to ListGroupMembers. This retrieves the next set of items. You can also specify a maximum number of return results with the MaxResults parameter.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier (ID) of the directory that's associated with the group.

parameters.name: MemberRealm
parameters.description: The domain name that's associated with the group member. This parameter defaults to the Managed Microsoft AD domain.

parameters.name: Realm
parameters.description: The domain name that's associated with the group.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: of the directory associated with the group.

nested_items.name: MemberRealm
nested_items.description: The domain name that's associated with the member.

nested_items.name: Members
nested_items.description: The member information that the request returns.

nested_items.name: MemberType
nested_items.description: The AD type of the member object.

nested_items.name: SAMAccountName
nested_items.description: The name of the group member.

nested_items.name: SID
nested_items.description: The unique security identifier (SID) of the group member.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: An encoded paging token for paginated calls that can be passed back to retrieve the next page.

nested_items.name: Realm
nested_items.description: The domain name that's associated with the group.
